website_summaries.verdict: Handsome table with an open design that adds visual interest and practical storage space.
pros: Offers an attractive, open two-tier design that's great for displaying trinkets
Woodgrain top contrasts nicely with the black base
cons: Quality control issues including missing pieces upon delivery are possible

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy , very pretty piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: No matter where you buy anything that comes on a box or having furniture delivered you take a Chance with the condition it may come in. So anything can happen once a company ships out a piece of furniture. That being said I ordered 2 of the might stands and they both came in great condition and I had no issues putting it together didn’t take me long at all. Had a drink put on my music and put it together no problem did both at once it was so easy. Plus they are very nice quality and feel pretty sturdy for a flower pot or a small decor. Happy with it happy with price !
customer_reviews.author: pi

customer_reviews.title: Don't mind getting the luck of the draw on which run of table you get? Go for it. Otherwise, AVOID.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2. First one arrived, put together, no issues. Opened 2nd box and took inventory and found a missing part. Hard to build a table with 3 legs. Returned, issued a replacement 2nd one. The 2nd one arrived and came from a different Chinese factory that didn't use the same parts and was of lesser quality (example- top of the first table is printed on both sides. Top of replacement is cheaply made and only printed on one side, just plain wood on other side). Disappointing experience overall and a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Quality End Table
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking table at an easy price. Table is quality press board, well as much as that is quality. Was packaged very secure. Pieces were all there so that’s a plus and the instructions (pictures) were super easy to follow. Didn’t really read them as I didn’t want to become frustrated before I even began. All and all a great buy and with kids who will eventually scratch the top, you won’t even notice because of the way the top is designed.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Love this end table and the whole set
customer_reviews.text: I have the entire set with coffee table, end tables and entertainment center with fireplace insert. The tables were all very easy to assemble on your own. The entertainment center was a little more difficult - took about 3 hours on my own. I love how everything looks! My living room is so much cozier than it ever was before.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bennington

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY AND AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Raining here in NY on the day when i recieved this item, I assumed automatically that I would probably have to return it because of water damage. To my surprised when I opened up the box I WAS SHOCKED to see it was perfectly packed to avoid water damage. The unit is sturdy, and I simply love the size of the item. Their was however a minor color fade on the bottem shelf - But its the bottom no one would see it..
customer_reviews.author: Waseem Mian

customer_reviews.title: Purchased two, Both had missing components
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two, Both had missing components. With the first one we put together, there were holes that you were supposed to thread screws into and two of the four holes did not have the metal threads inside the holes. So, the screws had nothing to attach to. We ended up having to jerry rig a solution that is not very attractive. For the second table we bought, it was missing parts needed to put it together and once again we are having to figure out how to make it work. This is unacceptable. This company needs to employ a quality control department because there obviously isn't one in place. Will not purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Goes together pretty easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match the coffee table that I already had. It was easier to assemble than I expected, but because of my experience with the coffee table coming loose, I decided to use wood glue at all of the connections to help hold it together.
customer_reviews.author: Eva J

customer_reviews.title: Just go to IKEA or a furniture store
customer_reviews.text: Another unstable cam lock POS just like the matching coffee table I bought from Amazon. I recently moved and learned the hard way.... Never buy anything furniture from Amazon if you want atleast half decent stuff Save yourself the time and go to IKEA or a furniture store pending on what you can spend. This furniture is a waste
customer_reviews.author: Steelstorm

customer_reviews.title: Solid, nice looking end table.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality (better than ikea. more substance). Easy to put together. nice solid end table. matches our sectional nicely. wish i had space for another one! I was looking for a table with a second shelf to hold a wireless subwoofer and a lamp. this works perfectly. Nothing against ikea, but some of their stuff is this segment is a little plan or flimsy. This thing is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Phive

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but a pain to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the matching coffee table. I absolutely love the look of them. However, they are a pain to put together so I would recommend buying them already assembled unless you are handy!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Had One Needed its Mate!
customer_reviews.text: Both tables easy to assemble for me, pat myself on the back for well executed assembly. very sturdy. will get the coffee table one, nice height for my La-Z-Boy, good table
customer_reviews.author: dragon

customer_reviews.title: Nice end tables
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and with no damage. Easy to put together. I would highly recommend using wood glue when put these end tables together. It will make them more sturdy and last longer. They look great in our living room and we're very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jansvendsen60

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stylish piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match a tv stand I previously ordered. The table top is more brown than the distressed gray tv stand but from across the room it is not really noticeable. It was very easy to put together (with the right tools). It seems sturdy and it looks good with my new furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Caron F

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The screws that came with it were badly misshapen as well as we were shorted two screws! I didn’t give it one star because I can imagine that once I can get it sturdy, it will look real nice. I wouldn’t recommend it though.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mireles

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: These table are not all that easy to put together my palm became swollen trying to screw the nails in the end table. I had to stop and start again two days later.
customer_reviews.author: Shadonna

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The table is exactly as advertised. It fits in nicely with the rest of our lanai furniture.
customer_reviews.author: jermaine

customer_reviews.title: These turned out very nice! Sturdy and heavy so not flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These turned out very nice! Sturdy and heavy so not flimsy. They’re well made. Just wish we didn’t have assemble it with like 20 pieces. The looks is very modern with a touch of warm wooden look.
customer_reviews.author: Babz

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Hard to see from the picture what the wood looks like. Very nice, smooth and came without a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Potasnik

customer_reviews.title: Looks Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We love this. It looks perfect in our living room!
customer_reviews.author: HappyMomof3

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two table. They look great. First one took about 45 min to assemble. Second one took 30 min. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Thebass

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hardware
customer_reviews.text: very attractive piece of furniture. Unfortunately the hardware that came with it was very cheap which made assembly difficult
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and beautiful piece of furniture! I've used it both for an end table in my living room for about a year and liked it so much I bought another to use as a night stand in my bedroom. It does come in lots of different pieces so it takes about an hour to put together, but the directions are clear and detailed so it wasn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Table is great. No problem putting together and I get tons of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: They look great and no stains from wet drinks. I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shoard

customer_reviews.title: Very NICE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with my purchase. Very good quality end tables for the living room. Love the wood color!
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Madise

customer_reviews.title: perfect match to a coffee table we bought a while ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute little end table, perfect match to a coffee table we bought a while ago.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to build, fits the room well, goes well with the other pieces in the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Aguiar

customer_reviews.title: Table is very decent but pieces are fragile
customer_reviews.text: Table is very decent. Only problem I found is that while assembling, some screws will crack the edges on some pieces so you have to be very careful building it.
customer_reviews.author: Dipendra G.

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, only problem it leaves black marks on the floor when moving it unless I was missing something for the bottom of it when I purchased it
customer_reviews.author: AdamTomBar

customer_reviews.title: Quality is super low even for a 60 night stand
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, I purchased 2, both had stripped screws. Not sure if its was used or not. Quality is super low even for a 60 night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Sakatosann

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected, easy to assemble. I ordered two and love them!!!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised. Some assembly is required but it's pretty straight forward. I'm very happy with the quality and I eventually plan on purchasing another to round out the room.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Virgo

customer_reviews.title: Damaged when opened box
customer_reviews.text: Product damaged when opened up the box Most of the parts were scratched
customer_reviews.author: C. Dean

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 but they only gave me one but took the price of both. It was really good but they forgot about mine one more
customer_reviews.author: Tham Dang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These tables look great at either end of my couch.
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece of Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Tables are very heavy and easy to put together. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Rose-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice end tables. they stand out and love the top look of them
customer_reviews.author: christoph scanlon

customer_reviews.title: Ameriwood home are great
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy side tables, great packaging so no damage and easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Liz McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this item!! Fit in just great, very sturdy, and I am happy we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: lynne williams

customer_reviews.title: Product featured is as shown !
customer_reviews.text: All the pieces were together . Easy assemble . Wood nice and heavy !
customer_reviews.author: Young Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, spacious, and stylish bedside tables. Ordering more soon for end tables in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R

customer_reviews.title: Well  made, easy to put together, shipped nicely, beautiful accent pieces
customer_reviews.text: Love these end tables. First the quality is amazing, the shipping came secured in boxes, so no damage and they were fairly easy to put together, each one about 10 minutes. We purchased two when we made over our living room and they are really fabulous looking. They did have a little off gassing, but that was gone in a day with the windows open. The color on top is like a gray wood grain and it looks stunning against the black legs and bottom platform. We changed our carpeting out for a gray petrified bamboo floor and these looks stunning with it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa W.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews about furniture but I was really impressed with these end tables. They are solid, heavy {30 lbs each}, and spacious {20 x 20 top}. The top piece is a wood grain look with a mix of black and grey. The assembly is somewhat involved - though doable. A cam fastening system is used. Using a low torque, battery driven screwdriver, made the job fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: "Awakened Christian"

customer_reviews.title: but I love the end product
customer_reviews.text: My dad assembled the table and said it was kind of a hassle, but I love the end product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The table is nice. The fact that it's now $8 cheaper 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: The table is nice. The fact that it's now $8 cheaper 3 days after I purchased two of them is not. Becides that the table is sturdy, not too bad to put together if you have two people.
customer_reviews.author: Cprisco

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This was an amazing find!! So cheap yet looks expensive. The wood top has grain so it looks and feels beautiful. I got 2 end tables and the coffee table. Love love love! Took me like 30 mins to put together, l with a 2 year old “helping”. Simple. UPDATE: We have had these tables for almost a year now and they’re still great. No chips or anything wrong with them. We get lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaC

product_meta.title: Ameriwood Home Carver End Table, Black
product_meta.description: Add extra style to your living room with the Ameriwood Home Carver End Table. This item is beautiful and functional. The top surface of the End Table is the perfect spot for your lamp or family photos while the lower shelf can be used to keep books and magazines in one handy space. The Carver End Table features a matte black finish with a distressed woodgrain top that creates a refined, clean look in your home. After assembled, the End Table measures to be 23.3"h x 20.1"w x 20.1"d.
feature_bullets: Keep items within reach while you relax on the sofa with the Carver End Table
End table dimensions – 20.1” W x 20.1” D x 23.3” H | Weight – 25.3 lbs. | Assembly required, 2 adults recommended
The end table is made of painted MDF and laminated particleboard
The table’s open bottom shelf and flat top surface provides plenty of storage for your favorite items
A gray finish and distressed brown woodgrain top create a stunning look that’ll fit into multiple design styles

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars169 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
